verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: During a rally Saturday outside the White House in Washington D.C.] , [ARG0: Malik Shabbazz , president of Black Lawyers for Justice ,] [V: called] [ARG1: on President Trump] [ARG2: to pay reparations to the black community] .

During a rally Saturday outside the White House in Washington D.C. , Malik Shabbazz , president of Black Lawyers for Justice , called on [ARG0: President Trump] to [V: pay] [ARG1: reparations] [ARG2: to the black community] .
